name: HelpMeDecide
0:
”Alexa, ask help me decide shorts or jeans?”
”Alexa, ask help me decide banana or grapes?”
”Alexa, ask help me decide dancing or bowling?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: help me decide
des:
Don't know if you want to wear shorts or jeans today? Or if it's better to get pizza or sushi tonight? Stress no more! Help Me Decide can make your life easier by making all those trivial but boring and stressful decisions for you! 

Just open the skill and ask "THIS" or "THAT" and it will answer back its decision to you! Penguins or Elephants? Spicy or Mild? Sleep or Study? It works with everything! 

Alexa is in the almighty cloud anyways, she knows what's best for you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
